articles.title: Gibbs Sampling

articles.title: Mathematical Statistics: Gibbs Sampling
articles.description: Welcome to the website. This website introduces Gibbs Sampling in Bayesian statistic world. This is a class project from course MATH/ STAT 455: Mathematical Statistics at Macalester College. The contents in this blog are collaborative efforts from Kristy Ma and Regan Brodine.
articles.contents:
Hi!
To start exploring, please simply navigate to tabs on the upper right corner. The table of contents is here:
Home: This page
Intro to Bayesian: Bayesian philosophy; Bayes rules
Gibbs Sampling: Gibbs Sampling Concept; Examples; Gibbs Sampling and Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC)
Applications: Gibbs Sampling in statistical genetics; A simulation study
Wrap-up: Outro; Other MCMC algorithms
Have fun!

If you have any questions, please reach out to kristy20011001@gmail.com and rbrodine@macalester.edu. Thank you!
